TEXT.TITLE: INTEGRATED CIRCUITS <ICTM> SETS RECORD DATE
TEXT.BODY: Integrated Circuits Inc said it set March 17 as the record date for its previously announced 10 pct stock dividend. The company said it will distribute the dividend on March 31. Reuter
